name: Send daily weather forecasts to a Discord channel
description: Stay informed about daily weather conditions with this seamless integration between Weather and Discord. Every day, Make will automatically fetch the daily weather forecast from Weather and send it as a message to your designated Discord channel. This template ensures that you and your community are always updated on the latest weather information, enhancing your planning and communication efforts. Perfect for event organizers, community managers, or anyone who wants to keep their team informed.
